title: Side Effects of Black in Fashion (with Nicole Chapoteau)
description:
This week, we’re joined by VF fashion editor Nicole Chapoteau, who gives us the head to toe on all things Black in Fashion.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
